name: openclaw
description: OpenClaw-powered agent with rich tools, memory, and browser control
usage:
Creates a VM running OpenClaw as the agent brain, bridged to AegisVM tether. Supports all AegisVM messaging channels (Telegram via gateway, MCP via tether_send/tether_read). OpenClaw provides rich tools: file I/O, bash, browser control, semantic memory, canvas, context compaction.

Quick start:
1. secret_list — check available secrets
2. instance_start with kit="openclaw", name="my-claw", secrets=["ANTHROPIC_API_KEY"], workspace="/path/to/project"
3. First boot takes ~60s (OpenClaw npm install, cached after)
4. Send messages via tether_send, read via tether_read

With Telegram:
1. Set secrets: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY + TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN
2. instance_start with kit="openclaw", name="my-claw", secrets=["ANTHROPIC_API_KEY"]
3. Create gateway config: ~/.aegis/kits/my-claw/gateway.json
   {"telegram":{"bot_token_secret":"TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN","allowed_chats":["*"]}}
4. Send photos and text — OpenClaw agent analyzes with full tool suite

Required secrets: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY (or OPENAI_API_KEY as alternative)
Optional secrets: TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN (only for Telegram gateway)
Requires: --workspace (mandatory for OpenClaw kit)
